channel.title: [Release/Prim] Shield Template
channel.description:
[size=24pt]IF YOU SO FAR AS CLICKED THIS THREAD, COMMENT[/size]
I decided to release this, well, simply because everybody does custom weapons, and i never see many shields. I think its time for change, or at least for some new shields.
Here is a Preveiw: [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259427769.png[/img]
Download: http://uppit.com/v/VE4XFKO8
NOTE - This is a template, no colors or anything. Don't say "Its got no design to it" Or anything in that form, simply because templates are supposed to be a base, not something already made good.
I do require at least 30% credits if you use this, since most people using it, wont be just adding a logo and coloring it.

item.title: [Release/Prim] Shield Template
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:6, topic:316708”][quote author=vexx1345 link=topic=413267.msg3044266#msg3044266 date=1259357938]
meh just a trace with a little bending and extruding right?
[/quote]
LOLXD its prim, moparscape is full of all tracer’s

@model not bad:)[/quote]

Thanks, i was originally making a new shield for my server, but i had brain-block trying to figure out what what to do with it from this step, so i released it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

vexx1345:

meh just a trace with a little bending and extruding right?

LMAO, yea i havent worked with tracing in a while. Trust me, this is a Primitive, simply using the Segements, and Move tools.
